quiet-woodland.name: Quiet woodland
quiet-woodland.description: A source of wood, but increases wildness and cannot be used for farming.

thick-forest.name: Deep forest
thick-forest.description: Great surprises and adventures await those who dare to venture this far into the woods.

shallow-harbour.name: Shallow habour
shallow-harbour.description: To catch fish you'll need to venture a little further out. A jetty can be built here to land boats.

sea.name: Open sea
sea.description: Teeming with fish of all types, waiting for you to catch.

rocks.name: Treacherous Rocks
rocks.description: Woe betide the sailor who attemps to pass.

grass.name: Grassland
grass.description: Can be used for farming, building and grazing livestock.
